code is the config for the Contentlayer. It will create a ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Post"}]," document type and will generate the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"url"}]," field based on the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"flattenedPath"}]," field."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["You can add more document types and fields such as ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Author"}]," and ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Category"}]," and more."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Now, we need to create a ",["$","code",null,{"children":"posts"}]," folder in the root of the project and create a ",["$","code",null,{"children":"hello-world.mdx"}]," file in it and add the following code:"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["You can name the file whatever you want. "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#4FB4D8"},"children":"Install Next.js"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":" "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#4FB4D8"},"children":"###"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#002339"},"children":" "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#4FB4D8"},"children":"Fist you need to install Next.js with the following command:"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":" "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#002339"},"children":"npm i create-next-app@latest"}]}]]}]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Above code This folder contains the generated JSON files, types and more."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["$","img",null,{"src":"https://i.postimg.cc/nrdVwTLt/Screenshot-2023-04-05-at-6-13-25-PM.png","alt":"generate contentlayer folder"}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["We need to install ",["$","code",null,{"children":"date-fns"}]," for sorting posts by date and format the date:"]}],"\n",["$","div",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"default","children":["$","code",null,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"default","children":["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#7EB233"},"children":"npm"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#002339"},"children":" "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#A44185"},"children":"i"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#002339"},"children":" "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"color":"#A44185"},"children":"date-fns"}]]}]}]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["And we need to add the following code in the blog with ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Contentlayer"}]," and ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Next.js"}],". The great feature of ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Contentlayer"}]," is that Contentlayer will automatically save and refresh the blog when you add a new blog post or edit an existing blog post."]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["In this tutorial, we have learned how to create a blog using ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Next.js"}],", ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Contentlayer"}],", and ",["$","code",null,{"children":"MDX"}],". We have learned how to create a blog post, how to list all posts, and how to highlight codes in the blog posts."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["You can find the source code of the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Contentlayer"}]," blog in the following GitHub repository:"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/arshad-yaseen/nextjs-appdir-blog","children":"Source code of example"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"children":"Resources"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://contentlayer.dev/","children":"Contentlayer"}]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://nextjs.org/","children":"Next.js"}]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://mdxjs.com/","children":"MDX"}]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://rehype-pretty-code.netlify.app/","children":"rehype-pretty-code"}]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["$","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/shikijs/shiki/blob/main/docs/themes.md#all-themes","children":"Shiki themes"}]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"children":"About the author"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://arshadd.site","children":"Arshad Yaseen"}],".
